questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign mean?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs signify warning or caution.

questions.question: If you see a sign with an orange background and black letters, what does it signify?
questions.explanation: Orange signs with black letters are used for temporary traffic control around construction zones.

questions.question: What does a red octagonal sign mean?
questions.explanation: A red octagonal sign is universally used for stop.

questions.question: What does a flashing red traffic light mean?
questions.explanation: A flashing red light means the same as a stop sign.

questions.question: What does a flashing yellow traffic light mean?
questions.explanation: A flashing yellow light indicates that drivers should slow down and proceed with caution.

questions.question: What should you do when you approach a yield sign?
options: Slow down and prepare to stop if necessary
questions.correctAnswer: Slow down and prepare to stop if necessary
questions.explanation: At a yield sign, drivers should slow down and prepare to stop if necessary.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way at an intersection with no crosswalks?
questions.explanation: At an intersection with no crosswalks, pedestrians have the right-of-way.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way when two cars arrive at an intersection at the same time?
questions.explanation: At an intersection, the car on the right has the right-of-way.

questions.question: What is the speed limit in a school zone when children are present?
questions.explanation: The speed limit in a school zone when children are present is 20 mph.

questions.question: What should you do if an emergency vehicle is approaching with its lights flashing?
options: Pull over to the right and stop
Speed up and get out of the way
Continue driving at the same speed
Pull over to the left and stop
questions.correctAnswer: Pull over to the right and stop
questions.explanation: You should always pull over to the right and stop when an emergency vehicle is approaching with its lights flashing.
